about:
This is a free online tool to instantly convert your Markdown text to a PDF document.

How to Use

1. Paste or directly write your Markdown content into this editor on the left.

2. Preview your formatted text in real-time on the right.

3. Click the "Save" button to open the print dialog. Choose "Save as PDF" as the destination to download your file. You can hide the metadata (like date and website name) in the dialog settings.

All conversion from Markdown to PDF happens directly in your browser. Your text never leaves your computer.

You can verify the source code here: https://github.com/guiopen/md2pdf
